current.about_text: There's a lot that goes into your every day and we know that it's important to maintain a balance. A good night's sleep and proper relaxation aren't just playful indulgence: they're the key to your overall well-being.
current.font_sub_slider1: 'Calisto MT', 'Bookman Old Style', Bookman, 'Goudy Old Style', Garamond, 'Hoefler Text', 'Bitstream Charter', Georgia, serif
current.image_3_headline_sld:
We don’t call it indulgence.
We call it living.
current.image_4_subtitle_sld:
Make it Personal with
Luxury Monogramming
current.feature2_description: Checkout our Support Center for theme-related articles, or the Shopify Manual for general shop setup.
current.feature3_description: Publish Parallax as your main theme when you're ready to launch. Let us know about new shop launches on Twitter!
current.cust_review_sub_txt_1: Love, Love, Love, ! Incredibly soft linens .. so many styles to chose from and really chic monogramming
current.cust_review_sub_txt_2: Lucious Towels and Robes ! Monogramming really add that personal touch.
current.cust_review_sub_txt_3: Really found the perfect place for bridesmaid gift.. Gift box presentation was top notch !!
current.cust_review_sub_txt_4: Mother's day gift approved !! Last year purchased a robe, this year going with some complimenting towels.
current.cust_review_sub_txt_5: New home destination heaven. Found everything we need for our bed and bath. Wife loves personlized sheets in the bedroom
current.cust_review_sub_txt_6: Mother-in-law loved her Egyptian Cotton robe !
current.supported_currencies: USD CAD AUD GBP EUR JPY
